issue.title: [Docs] Integration testing instructions for base docker image are incorrect
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8807](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8807). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The dev/README.md says to build a base image using this command, but the referenced file does not exist.
```java

docker build -t arrow_integration_xenial_base -f docker_common/Dockerfile.xenial.base . 
```
